We are very into Open Source

Show me your Github account and I will tell you who you are.
We love open source and are great contributors to various projects as well as have some of our own OS projects. Curious? Undoubtedly you are!

Our OS projects

Company blog

Here we usually brag about our company, write about our findings, tools and some jokes. We like to learn new things and share our lifehacks with you.

Want to talk to someone real?

You have checked our company blog! We are impressed! Want to move on? Discuss your project with somebody real. Like our Jan, who is a go-to person for your project.
